mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodLangbyTagResve Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ TAG_RESVE_SN , LANG_CD , TAG_NM , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_LANGBY_TAG_RESVE WHERE 1 = 1 AND TAG_RESVE_SN = #{tagResveSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND LANG_CD = #{langCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
